entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near noon and risk of freezing rain. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
